title: List of bears
data:
{{version031}}
'''Bears''' are beefy animals that can occasionally be found throughout the [[Dungeon]] and [[Lair]]. While they're less common than some other types of creatures, they make up for it by having multiple attacks and the ability to go [[berserk]] when badly injured.

==Bear Types==
{{monsterlink|Black bear}} - The common variety of bears. They can manage to rip apart fragile spellcasters, but most other characters will have an easy time with them.

{{monsterlink|Polar bear}} - [[Amphibious]] bears hailing from arctic climes, their thick white fur gives them [[cold resistance]]. Often found in [[Ice Cave]]s.

==Retired bears==
{{monsterlink|Grizzly bear}} - Bigger, stronger bears, but otherwise not very noteworthy.

{{monsterlink|Ancient bear}} - Huge, powerful bears whose long lives in magical places gave them [[fire resistance]]. Considered for [[0.14]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], [[fear|fleeing]] bears could go berserk.
*In [[0.15]], grizzly bears were removed.
